name: Treasure of Life
description:
A young pirate was sailing at sea with his crew and their ship filled with newly found treasures. Shortly after that, his ship crashed, and he woke up alone, on a desert island. What happened at sea? Where are all of his crew members? How would he leave the island? These are the questions the young explorer would have to answer, and this is his journey.

Game made (Alpha version) for the 'Below the Stone Community Game Jam #1'

Created by Calmlight Studios - nheve, Gendgi, Icelogia.

nheve - music & sfx, pixelart, story, levels design, coding, management

Gendgi - hand drawing, digital art, story, levels design

Icelogia - pixelart, story, mechanics ideas, enemies design
